metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1754 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In Moodle before 3.8.2, 3.7.5, 3.6.9 and 3.5.11, users viewing the grade history report without the 'access all groups' capability were not restricted to viewing grades of users within their own groups.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
